Clutch 11

CLUTCH ASSEMBLY, Adjust

Includes:
1. Release bearing and/or pedal free travel

Notes:
1. Not to be used with clutch replacement

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A11-3140 Models, ALL 0.5

CLUTCH ASSEMBLY (REFERAL), R & R and/or Replace

Notes:
1. See Group 13, Remove and Reinstall Transmission "Add On If Required"

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A11-000 Models, ALL 0.0

CLUTCH LINKAGE CONTROL ROD(S) UPPER OR LOWER, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R fender extension when required
3. Check and adjust clutch

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A11-3120 Other Models 0.6
A11-3121 7600 0.7
A11-3121 8600 0.7
A11-3121 ProStar 0.7

CLUTCH PEDAL RETURN SPRING, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R trim panel(s) when required
3. R&R instrument cluster assembly when required

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A11-3160 Models, ALL 0.3

CLUTCH ROD BOOT, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Check and adjust clutch

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A11-3125 Models, ALL 0.6

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A11-T1 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A11-T2 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A11-T3 Models, ALL 0.0
